A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: i think this one is the most compelling and interesting story in star wars franchise. so many challenges comes upon in this film.. and i think overall it justified it perfectly. some twist are quite interesting but with incredible amount of loopholes.. still i think the whole story tells a journey.. and i believe there should be a new generation past skywalkers and it finally started it!! i think this is the new beginning and the upcoming movie with JJ directing will give us a perfect end... i liked it a lot!!
